thread.title: New York Luxury
thread.title_full: New York Luxury - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BrunoBoov
title: New York Luxury
text: You always hear about New York being the best in the world for so many things, and how expensive it is. The service at The Pierre is unrivaled anywhere in the world. I'm from Brazil and you we have truly unbelievable resorts and hotels, but this gem of a hotel would be a success anywhere it would land. The staff is truly genuine and the look of happiness on their faces is priceless. They are truly proud to be in hospitality and you feel it. I only wish I could stay forever and live this experience all day. Truly the most elegant and amazing experience ever!
